verbs.description: The biggest potential losers from [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] threat to [V: impose] [ARG1: tariffs on imported cars and trucks] are all US allies . The top five losers would be Mexico , Canada , Japan , Germany , and South Korea .

[ARG1: The biggest potential losers from President Donald Trump 's threat to impose tariffs on imported cars and trucks] [V: are] all [ARG2: US allies] . The top five losers would be Mexico , Canada , Japan , Germany , and South Korea .
